text: Harry Jacob van den Bergh (1 April 1942 – 20 March 2020) was a Dutch politician of Jewish descent. He was a member of the Labour Party (PvdA). Een politicus blikt terug, Nieuw Israëlietisch Weekblad, 6 January 2012 In 1977–1987 van den Bergh was a member of the lower house. Later he became a councilor in Amstelveen.Drs. H.J. (Harry) van den Bergh He was born in Amsterdam and died in Amstelveen at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Dutch councillors Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Jewish Dutch politicians Category:Labour Party (Netherlands) politicians Category:Politicians from Amsterdam
title: Harry van den Bergh
